action.name: Multiattack
entries: El cazarrecompensas realiza dos ataques con espada larga. Si tiene una maza desenfundada, también puede hacer un ataque con garrote.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance de 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de daño cortante, u 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de daño cortante si se usa a dos manos.

action.name: Cudgel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} para golpear, alcance 5 pies, un objetivo. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de daño por apaleamiento.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} para golpear, alcance 100/400 pies, un objetivo. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de daño penetrante.

action.name: Bola
entries: Una bola es una cuerda con pesas en cada extremo que se lanza a las piernas de un objetivo que huye.

{@atk rw} {@hit 4} para golpear, alcance 30/50 pies, un objetivo. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de daño contundente. Una criatura grande o más pequeña golpeada debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de {@dc 13} Destreza o convertirse en {@condition grappled} {@dc 12} chequeo de Fuerza para romper. La bola tiene 4 puntos de golpe.
Un cazarrecompensas puede usar una Bola durante un ataque de oportunidad incluso si el objetivo ha usado la acción {@action Disengage}.

Los cazarrecompensas profesionales son duros y tenaces en su persecución, pero también tienen la suficiente experiencia para saber cuándo un objetivo está fuera de su alcance. Se alían con otros cazarrecompensas si es necesario, pero también contratan mercenarios o incluso trabajan con enemigos del objetivo.

table.name: Poor Taverns (2 gp)
intro: A Poor lifestyle gets you a flophouse with just a few overcrowded rooms or a taphouse where anyone staying the night simply sleeps in the common room. If you pay early in the day you might get the use of a threadbare blanket, otherwise the accommodations are little more than bad food, bad company, and floor space.

table.name: Poor Tavern Random Events and Adventure Hooks
intro: A Poor lifestyle gets you a flophouse with just a few overcrowded rooms or a taphouse where anyone staying the night simply sleeps in the common room. If you pay early in the day you might get the use of a threadbare blanket, otherwise the accommodations are little more than bad food, bad company, and floor space.
rows: Los granjeros locales están preparando un asalto a un campamento de goblins porque nadie más quiere ayudar.
Hay un extraño silencio en la sala común. La gente se guarda para sí misma y se revuelca en sus propias penas.
El único plato es un guiso grumoso salido de un enorme caldero que parece no haber encontrado nunca un cepillo.
El camarero también es un curandero, lo más parecido a un sanador que hay en esta zona.
Hay un olor terrible que proviene de una habitación trasera, pero el posadero finge no notar nada.
El agua gotea desde una grieta en el techo. ¿Está lloviendo fuera?
Un enterrador entra y camina lentamente por la sala, midiendo a todos con la mirada.
Un miembro de la Guardia Urbana arrastra a uno de los clientes fuera para darle una paliza en la calle.
Una chica que vende flores marchitas intenta vender a los clientes antes de que el camarero la persiga hasta la calle.
Más de una vez, alguien trata de robarte torpemente.
El deprimido posadero le cuenta que antes era un negocio próspero, antes de la maldición de su familia.
Unos cuantos lugareños juegan a los dados por piezas de cobre.
Un cazarrecompensas entra a tomar algo, llevando a un elfo con una mordaza y una correa de cadena.
El gorila medio orco dice que te echará si vuelves a hacer eso. ¿Qué hiciste exactamente?
El posadero mira con nerviosismo a un grupo de mercenarios que gritan improperios a otros clientes.
Un hombre te mira de arriba abajo y te dice que pareces lo suficientemente fuerte como para ganar algo de dinero extra si tienes el estómago.
Un halfling con poco talento entona algún tipo de melodía en un instrumento de aspecto maltrecho.
Una mercenaria de aspecto duro en el bar cuenta en voz alta chistes racistas, sin importarle quién la oiga.
Dos niños entran a tirar de la ropa de un borracho que está desmayado bajo una mesa. Él no responde.
Alguien arroja su bebida sobre la cabeza de un semielfo, murmurando que no es natural que las razas se mezclen.

table.name: Modest Taverns (1 gp)
intro: Unlike Poor flophouses, these are proper inns and taverns, even if they tend to be a bit rundown or minimal. There are rooms for rent upstairs or in the back but they are sometimes shared and any locks or security measures are not usually enough to stop anyone who is very determined. The food is adequate, but nothing special and the company can sometimes be a little rough.

table.name: Modest Tavern Random Events and Adventure Hooks
intro: Unlike Poor flophouses, these are proper inns and taverns, even if they tend to be a bit rundown or minimal. There are rooms for rent upstairs or in the back but they are sometimes shared and any locks or security measures are not usually enough to stop anyone who is very determined. The food is adequate, but nothing special and the company can sometimes be a little rough.
rows: Ves un cartel de búsqueda y te das cuenta de que has visto al fugitivo ese mismo día.
Un enano mal vestido intenta pagar sus bebidas con un pequeño diamante. La camarera dice que no puede aceptarlo.
El negocio ha bajado porque aquí hubo un asesinato hace dos noches.
Los lugareños no salen ni dejan salir a nadie después de medianoche, por miedo al espíritu hambriento que ronda la zona.
Hay una fiesta de boda en la sala de atrás. Los novios llevan galas andrajosas pero parecen felices.
Un comerciante y su empleado entran en la sala común. Le dice al dependiente: "También derribaremos este".
Hay un aviso de derechos de salvamento en un castillo abandonado si eres lo suficientemente valiente como para enfrentarte a sus monstruosos ocupantes.
La mujer de un granjero está enferma y él intenta vender su único caballo de tiro para poder pagar las medicinas.
Hay un renacimiento artístico en la ciudad y la posada está llena de artistas, pintores y escultores esperanzados.
Varios clientes se ríen cuando miran por la ventana. Un gran perro ha perseguido a un halfling hasta un árbol.
Alguien dice en voz alta al tabernero que los extranjeros están arruinando la zona para los locales. Él mira a los aventureros.
Un bardo errante canta una serie de canciones subidas de tono que hacen que los padres se vayan con sus hijos.
La sala común se ha convertido en un hervidero de sentimientos revolucionarios y discursos airados sobre la igualdad.
Hay una lista de puestos de trabajo colgada en la pared, pero la mayoría de los lugareños no saben leer.
Alguien consigue unas cuantas risas rellenando su camisa y fingiendo ser el alcalde.
Un viejo soldado se ofrece a enseñarte sus cicatrices y a contarte unas cuantas historias espeluznantes a cambio de un trago o tres.
Todo el mundo parece abatido. Te cuentan que un héroe popular local ha sido detenido y va a ser ahorcado.
Hasta altas horas de la noche, como si se tratara de un acuerdo tácito, se producen peleas por toda la sala común.
Una persona, que todos suponían que era un borracho desmayado, resulta estar muerta por una herida de cuchillo.
Un noble local está pasando la noche en los barrios bajos. Paga generosamente por las bebidas y luego se tambalea en la calle.

table.name: Comfortable Taverns (2 gp)
intro: Guests here are always offered a clean, private room and two or three very good meals. The common room can be lively but doesn't tend to get raucous or violent. Soft beds and furniture in good repair are the norm. These are the taverns that most frequently house adventurers with a reputation for doing good. The owners might even have once been adventurers themselves.

table.name: Comfortable Tavern Random Events and Adventure Hooks
intro: Guests here are always offered a clean, private room and two or three very good meals. The common room can be lively but doesn't tend to get raucous or violent. Soft beds and furniture in good repair are the norm. These are the taverns that most frequently house adventurers with a reputation for doing good. The owners might even have once been adventurers themselves.
rows: Un halfling de fuera de la ciudad hace una escena cuando desaparece de repente.
Una joven maga entra y comienza a preguntar a todos si han visto un libro de hechizos que extravió anoche.
Desde que salió a trompicones del bosque la semana pasada, una joven elfa se pasa el tiempo mirando en silencio por la ventana.
Oyes a un lugareño contar una historia de aventuras que suena terriblemente parecida a algo que tú has vivido.
La posada dispone de un servicio para engrasar, pulir, afilar y mantener el equipo de los huéspedes.
Uno de los lugareños saca un instrumento de cuerda y el público empieza a aplaudir. La pista se despeja para bailar.
La posada ha servido a los aventureros durante generaciones y varios recuerdos interesantes cuelgan de la pared.
El posadero emplea a varios fornidos lacayos para que los huéspedes se comporten y no se metan en peleas.
Una leyenda local de las aventuras ha muerto de viejo. Esta noche se contarán muchas historias y se beberá en su honor.
Dos matones se abren paso a hombros hasta la barra y mantienen una tensa y murmurada conversación con el tabernero.
Un investigador de la Guardia Urbana tiene las puertas cerradas hasta que haya interrogado a todos sobre un crimen reciente.
Uno de los personajes del jugador recibe un mensaje urgente de alguien con quien tiene un vínculo.
Debido a una reciente festividad religiosa, la posada está llena de monjes, sacerdotes y clérigos de distintos credos.
Un guerrero herido ha vuelto de la aventura, espera que algunos de sus compañeros sigan vivos.
Hay un rumor de que un villano que creías muerto ha sobrevivido de alguna manera y está buscando venganza.
Un alquimista de la zona está buscando almas valientes dispuestas a dejarle probar unos cuantos experimentos "casi inofensivos".
Una compañía de aventureros con menos experiencia que la tuya te pide consejo para conseguir riquezas y gloria.
Ves a un extranjero incómodo que no habla muy bien el común intentando hacer una pregunta.
Alguien pide un brindis por los héroes que luchan contra la oscuridad y defienden a las personas buenas de todo el mundo.
Un tesoro aventurero que se exhibía con orgullo en la taberna y que todos disfrutaban ha desaparecido.

table.name: Wealthy Taverns (3 gp)
intro: These taverns cater specifically to those who have money and want to prove it, especially affluent individuals who lack the hereditary title to make them proper aristocrats. Guards and servants are plentiful and there is usually a guest vault on the premises. Wealthy taverns are havens of luxury away from anyone ragged or dirty because such persons are turned away at the door. While usually found in large cities, a Wealthy establishment could also be a country lodge or beachfront resort.

table.name: Wealthy Tavern Random Events and Adventure Hooks
intro: These taverns cater specifically to those who have money and want to prove it, especially affluent individuals who lack the hereditary title to make them proper aristocrats. Guards and servants are plentiful and there is usually a guest vault on the premises. Wealthy taverns are havens of luxury away from anyone ragged or dirty because such persons are turned away at the door. While usually found in large cities, a Wealthy establishment could also be a country lodge or beachfront resort.
rows: Un comerciante se ríe nerviosamente y dice que necesita contratar un guardaespaldas... inmediatamente.
Un mecenas acude al aventurero con una oportunidad de inversión empresarial. Dos palabras: Mercería móvil.
La apertura de una nueva galería ha traído a la ciudad a varios artistas famosos durante la semana.
Se está llevando a cabo una protesta en el exterior. Los trabajadores amenazan con hacer una huelga para reclamar más salarios.
Un mercader propone abrir una ruta comercial más corta a través de una zona peligrosa. Habrá que explorarla.
En una mesa cercana, un rico comerciante y un joven de aspecto asustado están firmando un contrato.
Una de las guardias está convencida de que usted es un fraude y le susurra que tiene los ojos puestos en usted.
Una caravana de enanos ha llegado a la ciudad y están buscando bienes comerciales para llevarlos de vuelta bajo la montaña.
Te encuentras con un humano muy bajo que es extremadamente sensible a su altura. Todos sus sirvientes son halflings.
Mientras se degustan manjares de tierras extranjeras, todo el mundo finge que le gusta la comida para que los demás los consideren cultos.
Una pareja adinerada anuncia que va a poner en marcha un programa de asistencia social, pero nadie parece estar muy interesado.
Un clérigo es rápidamente escoltado fuera después de que se suba a una mesa y comience un sermón sobre los males de la codicia.
Una heredera confiada, que acaba de recibir su fortuna, ya está atrayendo a los amigos equivocados.
Se arma un revuelo cuando las monedas de un respetado comerciante resultan ser falsas. Él alega su inocencia.
Cierto comerciante disfruta de un monopolio ahora que las bandas han expulsado a todos sus rivales de la ciudad.
Un terrateniente ha mejorado tanto la vida de sus inquilinos que se enfrenta a la quiebra y pide préstamos.
Un famoso aventurero que ganó su fortuna matando dragones ha desaparecido. ¿Buscarlo a él o a su tesoro?
Durante la cena, un empleado entra corriendo para gritar que un gran banco ha quebrado provocando un gran pánico financiero en la zona.
Oyes a varios grupos hablar de una fiesta de jóvenes herederos y herederas que han desaparecido.
Cuando las luces se apagan de repente, muchas joyas y los acróbatas que se encargan del entretenimiento aparecen desaparecidos.

table.name: Aristocratic Taverns (6 gp)
intro: While many nobles host events in their own palatial dwellings, sometimes a third party venue is preferred for social events. With a dedicated "tavern," nobles always have a place to go to engage with their peers and traveling aristocrats need not rely on their relations. Such an establishment might be a dining hall attached to an opera stage or a similar arrangement with a ballroom or art gallery

table.name: Aristocratic Tavern Random Events and Adventure Hooks
intro: While many nobles host events in their own palatial dwellings, sometimes a third party venue is preferred for social events. With a dedicated "tavern," nobles always have a place to go to engage with their peers and traveling aristocrats need not rely on their relations. Such an establishment might be a dining hall attached to an opera stage or a similar arrangement with a ballroom or art gallery
rows: Se está celebrando una partida de cartas de alto nivel. Solo son bienvenidos los que poseen terrenos para apostar.
Dos jóvenes nobles se gritan y sacan sus espadas.
A woman in a veil glides through the room and up the stairs. Someone whispers, "The Queen."
Several young nobles laugh at you for wearing a clothing style that is so last year.
The inn is hosting a party exclusively for local nobility and their guests.
Barely touched plates of food are constantly being thrown away. Outside, guards chase away hungry beggars.
A hollow-eyed, embarrassed young noble drifts from table to table, asking for an outrageously large loan.
The host looks at some members of your party and insists that servants should use the back entrance.
A highly respected leader of a church is passing through on a tour of the region. He wears lavish jewelry.
A brick wrapped in paper flies through one of the windows. The paper is a message promising revenge.
A high-ranking noble wears a truly awful hat he is trying to make fashionable. He receives many compliments.
One of the nobles invites the adventuring company to his private hunting lodge beside an untamed wilderness.
A diplomat from a nearby country looks around, apparently not happy with what he sees.
One of the nobles takes grave insult from something that you have done, said, or not done or not said.
Hearing that you may travel soon, a noble offers payment for the escort of her son to a wizard's tower.
A drunk noble begins angrily spilling secrets about other patrons that shock everyone present.
You meet an old general with very bad manners. He was ennobled after a recent war but no one talks to him
The host doubts that you are on the guest list for tonight's private party. Do you have an invitation?
In celebration of their engagement, a couple pays for everyone's food and drink for the evening.
A prince has been abducted by a dragon and his parents will pay a fortune for his safe return.

table.name: Shady Taverns (5 sp)
intro: Whether it's a front for a hidden criminal enterprise or a legitimate business which caters to the villainous underworld, Shady taverns are a place for illegal deals, illicit news, and smuggled goods. The proprietor is sure to employ several thugs who are usually there for the protection of the establishment rather than the patrons. A place like this will have a bad reputation that is more truth than rumor.

table.name: Shady Tavern Random Events and Adventure Hooks
intro: Whether it's a front for a hidden criminal enterprise or a legitimate business which caters to the villainous underworld, Shady taverns are a place for illegal deals, illicit news, and smuggled goods. The proprietor is sure to employ several thugs who are usually there for the protection of the establishment rather than the patrons. A place like this will have a bad reputation that is more truth than rumor.
rows: The bartender warns you that several patrons here are sick of your face and you'd best leave.
A raid by the City Watch. Everyone here is under arrest for conspiracy against the government.
Two thugs carry a wriggling, man-sized sack out the back door.
Someone sits at your table and drops several cryptic phrases. When you don't respond correctly, she moves on.
The tavern is set in an old warehouse with crates for tables and barrels for chairs.
A dark figure's cloak opens just enough to reveal City Watch issued weapons and armor.
The twang of a crossbow. A scoundrel throws some money on the bar on his way out. "Sorry about the mess."
A girl leaves with a couple. She matches the description of a recently kidnapped heiress.
After the barkeep gasps and falls dead. A new barkeep announces the place is under new management.
A woman tries to sell you a key that supposedly works on the back door of the governor's mansion.
You're fairly certain the gamblers in the corner are playing with loaded dice. This probably won't end well.
This tavern is the perfect place to find illegal food from a country under a trade embargo.
A wizard in the back room will perform illegal or unscrupulous divinations in his crystal ball for a fee.
With his refusal to take bribes, a new politician is making life hard for the underdogs of society.
There's a new Captain of the Watch who is teaching his men to stab first and ask questions later.
The tension between gangs in this are threatens to turn into an all-out street war.
A ruthless crime lord rules this area with an iron fist, but the common people love and trust him.
Thugs at the bar loudly share stories of the beatings they have given recently.
After you leave, you are certain you are being following through the streets by one or more of the other patrons.
A man being arrested screams, "The knife made me do it!" You spot a jeweled dagger underneath his table.

table.name: Dockside Taverns (4 sp)
intro: The docks of a big city can seem like another world. It's here that travelers, traders, sailors, and shipwrights all meet to do business with each other and the occasional pirate, smuggler, or spy. Dockside taverns take on little characteristics of places where the owners and the patrons have traveled. They are an excellent meeting place for those who spend their lives on land or sea. Like their patrons, Dockside taverns tend to be a little rough but worth getting to know.

table.name: Dockside Tavern Random Events and Adventure Hooks
intro: The docks of a big city can seem like another world. It's here that travelers, traders, sailors, and shipwrights all meet to do business with each other and the occasional pirate, smuggler, or spy. Dockside taverns take on little characteristics of places where the owners and the patrons have traveled. They are an excellent meeting place for those who spend their lives on land or sea. Like their patrons, Dockside taverns tend to be a little rough but worth getting to know.
rows: A captain is headed down the coast and is taking on passengers for free of they work with the crew on the way.
A one-eyed, hook-handed, peg-legged old sailor tells about the time he survived an encounter with a dire shark.
Sailors tell the tale of a moving island full of monsters, treasure, and the power to heal any wound.
After missing for three years, a ship docks with a crew who all think they've only been gone three weeks.
A ship has been quarantined on suspicion of carrying an undead plague.
The dock master has been arrested for corruption and taking bribes. That's the third one this year.
A patron casually mentions that there are ways to get anything in or out of the city.
Small exotic pets brought in on a ship a few weeks ago have started turning into ravenous beasts overnight.
After a crash in the harbor, crewmembers on two sinking ships are trapped below decks.
The Navigator's Guild will pay someone to map the small islands of a recently discovered archipelago.
A mysterious sailor pays for his drink by tossing an ancient coin on the table. Whoever touches it feels angry.
One patron accuses another of being a pirate. A fight breaks out between the crews.
A woman says she needs your help to stowaway on a ship or she'll be caught and killed by her rich uncle.
The tavern is made from the converted hull of an old sailing ship. Some say it is haunted.
In the dead of night the dock district is struck by raiding pirates who loot and pillage everything they can.
A fortune teller has nothing to say but doom and terror for anyone traveling on the sea this month.
A crate of mysterious cargo fell into the sea a few days ago and now part of the harbor is frozen over in summer.
The navy has returned laden with treasure after sacking a pirate town. Some say it will lead to a reprisal.
Recently, anyone who sleeps near the water is subject to terrible, maddening dreams of aberrations.
A humanoid shark has been terrorizing the coast during each full moon since last winter.

table.name: Roadside Taverns (1 gp)
intro: Whether on well-trodden roads in civilized lands or in remote, half-forgotten places there exist taverns which cater specifically to travelers. These roadside establishments often provide a welcome respite from yet another night sleeping on the ground. They are often converted farmhouses with easy access to gardens, farmer's markets, and places to find wild game. Sometimes such a place will act like a community center or post office for the scattered inhabitants of the region.

table.name: Roadside Tavern Random Events and Adventure Hooks
intro: Whether on well-trodden roads in civilized lands or in remote, half-forgotten places there exist taverns which cater specifically to travelers. These roadside establishments often provide a welcome respite from yet another night sleeping on the ground. They are often converted farmhouses with easy access to gardens, farmer's markets, and places to find wild game. Sometimes such a place will act like a community center or post office for the scattered inhabitants of the region.
rows: A young man rushes in and slams the door saying there is a wild animal outside and the horses are panicking.
A half-elf pays for her room and goes upstairs. Later, an angry mob demands the witch be turned over for justice.
You meet other travelers coming from the opposite direction on the road and they'd love to exchange news.
A long-legged ranger sits in a corner with his hood up. He smokes a pipe and watches you.
A large caravan has stopped here for the night and there isn't enough room. Someone is sleeping in the hay loft.
The outside of this inn looks bright and new, but the inside is dusty, moldy, and falling apart.
A fire breaks out at the inn. With concerted effort it can be put out before there is much damage.
The proprietor asks where you are going and if you'll deliver a packet of mail for people from the region.
Strange, wild noises come from a locked shed a few dozen yards away from the inn proper.
Pipe music sometimes drifts from the nearby woods. The owner says that it is the fairies dancing.
The owner apologizes for the lack of variety at dinner. The latest delivery cart disappeared on the road.
During the night, something huge snuffles outside your window. In the morning there are clawed tracks.
Heavy rain and thunderstorms last for {@dice 1d4} days, turning the road into a muddy mess.
The inn has a tradition of telling ghost stories in the common room after dark. The scariest story wins a prize.
The owner's husband invites you and your companions on a hunting trip to replenish the stores
The innkeeper angrily turns away an ugly beggar at night. In the morning, all of the food in the inn has spoiled.
A young woman eats alone. Her shoes, not made for walking, are nearly in shreds and her satchel seems empty.
The inn is graced with the presence of a very noble family for the evening.
Locals trickle in after dark. Soon they clear the room and break out the fiddle for a rousing dance.
A fussy little man walks in and begins taking measurements. He intends to open another inn across the road.
